biotools.summary: Program implementing a Markov Chain Monte Carlo algorithm to sample the posterior distribution of the different parameters underlying the Bayesian hierarchical model. It is primarily aimed at estimating in Pool-Seq experiment the effective diploid size of pools/replicates (e.g. identified by molecular barcodes) from SNP allele count data. Note that each pool (or replicate) are assumed to originate from the same population.

bioschemas.name: poolne_estim
